text: 21 Jump Street is a 2012 American action criminal comedy movie starring Jonah Hill and Channing Tatum, scripted by Michael Bacall, and directed by Phil Lord and Chris Miller. The movie was produced by Stephen J. Cannell. Roger Ebert gave the movie 3 out of 4 stars. It is followed by 22 Jump Street. == Other websites == * Category:2012 action movies Category:2012 buddy movies Category:2012 comedy movies Category:2012 crime movies Category:2010s action comedy movies Category:2010s criminal comedy movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Buddy action movies Category:2010s buddy comedy movies Category:Buddy cop movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies based on TV series Category:Proms in movies Category:American high school movies Category:American satirical movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies about police officers Category:Police comedy movies Category:Teen movies
title: 21 Jump Street (movie)
